sentences.en: A branch of our cosmic D - Dogs were fucked up by comic Zenith!
sentences.cn: 头植帮的人马居然被新江南帮打败了!

sentences.en: Being is a cosmic being, under the cosmic laws.
sentences.cn: 人类是宇宙中的人类, 是服从于宇宙规律的.

sentences.en: Cosmic ray is high - energy particle ray coming from outer space.
sentences.cn: 宇宙射线是来自外太空的 高能 粒子射线.

sentences.en: Cosmic rays and X - rays produce energetic electrons by ionization.
sentences.cn: 宇宙射线和 X 射线因其电离作用产生高能电子.

sentences.en: Do you believe in a cosmic plan?
sentences.cn: 你相信冥冥中的安排吗？

sentences.en: Feel the cosmic intelligence push through you right now.
sentences.cn: 感觉宇宙的智慧现在正伸展通过你.

sentences.en: Geometry of an interplanetary CME on October 29,2003 deduced from cosmic rays.
sentences.cn: 根据宇宙射线推论的2003年10月29日行星间CME的几何学.

sentences.en: His "cosmic vision" is to blend Christianity with "the wisdom of all world religions".
sentences.cn: 他的“远大设想”就是将基督教和“全世界所有宗教的智慧”融为一体。

sentences.en: I became skilled in ignoring these cosmic threats and developed a callousness toward all metaphysical preachments.
sentences.cn: 我变得油滑了,根本不理睬这些漫无边际的威胁,而且对一切玄奥的说教都变得麻木不仁了.

sentences.en: It's as if they were in some sense cosmic beings.
sentences.cn: 从某种意义上看来,他们似乎是宇宙人.

sentences.en: the cosmic laws governing our world
sentences.cn: 主宰我们世界的宇宙法则

sentences.en: These molecular flips are generally attributed to cosmic rays or thermodynamic noise.
sentences.cn: 这些分子的随机变动一般归因于宇宙射线或者某种热动力学的干扰.

sentences.en: They also contain a lot of cosmic crud, mostly in the form of dust-sized grains.
sentences.cn: 它们也含有一些宇宙杂质，大多是灰尘大小的颗粒。

sentences.en: This construct offers another approach to explaining cosmic acceleration.
sentences.cn: 这些额外维度或许提供了另一种解释宇宙加速膨胀的方式.

sentences.en: This has all the appearance of a cosmic free lunch.
sentences.cn: 这就产生了广泛的免费午餐.

sentences.en: We could have flashed by one another like two pieces of cosmic dust.
sentences.cn: 我们本来也可能像一闪而过的两粒宇宙尘埃一样失之交臂.

words.tran_cn: 宇宙发生的；由宇宙（射）线产生的
宇宙进化论；宇宙的产生，宇宙的起源
[天] 宇宙论，[天] 宇宙学

trans.tran_cn: 宇宙的，外太空的，巨大且重要的
trans.tran_en: relating to space or the universe
